text:
Notwithstanding modern times; Sheepshead Bay has its traveling merchant of hardware. Scene taken at Emmons Ave., and East 27th Street, Brooklyn.

July 13, 1933.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Occupations - Peddlers - Hardware - [Brooklyn].

text:
Sheepshead Bay (Brooklyn): West across new dock construction off Emmons Avenue, seen from East 27th Street. On the extreme right (views 1,2) is the Lewis House, about a century old. Views 2 and 3 show the East 27th Street beach.

Views 1,2: July 9, 1936
View 3: August 14, 1937

P. L. Sperr

A2 Negative # 3942
A3 Negative # 3940
title: Sheepshead Bay - Brooklyn.
